EmailTemplate.name: Global_Webinar_Evolving DevOps: The Benefits of PaaS and Application Dial Tone_Q
EmailTemplate.subject: Join the DevOps Movement and Transform your Infrastructure
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi {{lead.First Name:default=There}},
The DevOps movement has enabled organizations to leave behind months-long procurement cycles and instead get the infrastructure they need in a matter of hours or minutes. Greater gains can be realized when the application development and hosting platform provides capabilities further up the stack, at the PaaS layer.
Register <http://www.pivotal.io/platform-as-a-service/unlocking-the-value-of-devops-through-platform-as-a-service> for this webinar and learn about the value of an application-centric approach to the complete platform, and how it can transform your infrastructure into an abstracted application layer that stands ready to initiate services on demand. Youâ€™ll also hear about outcomes experienced by Pivotal CF PaaS early adopters.
JOIN US >> <http://www.pivotal.io/platform-as-a-service/unlocking-the-value-of-devops-through-platform-as-a-service> EVOLVING DEVOPS: THE BENEFITS OF PAAS & APPLICATION DIAL TONE WEDNESDAY DECEMBER 10, 2014 10AM PST REGISTER <http://www.pivotal.io/platform-as-a-service/unlocking-the-value-of-devops-through-platform-as-a-service>
